response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would significantly benefit you. Considering its value and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs and surpass your expectations. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 12000}
